companyName: 動力安全資訊股份有限公司
description:
About the Job
At Dynasafe, we're leading customers on their journey to Automations (Intelligent Building, Smart Data Center, Industry 4.0, and IoT) and Software-Defined Network(SDN) by enabling them to increase their productivity and security. If you're passionate about programming, learning new technologies, and working in an ambitious and highly visible project environment, please don’t hesitate to apply for this position. The potential candidate would be a member of the R&D team working on solutions based on SDN platform and various Automation standards.
在動力安全，我們帶領企業客戶走向以軟體整合應用SDN網路為基礎的自動化與智慧化 (智慧建築，智慧機房，工業4.0，與物聯網)。協助客戶提高安全，效率，於增強在國際上的競爭能力。
若你對自動化系統及SDN網路有興趣, 及對寫軟體程式學習新技術充滿熱忱，歡迎你加入動力的行列。


Role and responsibilities:  
．Design and develop a highly customizable Automation and/or SDN-based solutions. (設計開發自動化及以SDN為基礎的應用軟體系統)
．Write functional and design specs as well as responding to requirement documents and system level test plans. (編寫軟體規格文件，測試計劃等)
．Collaborate well with other engineers and other engineering groups for team work(需與其它部門協同合作)

我們正在尋找對資料分析有熱情，coding功力修練許久的你。加入PacSoft台灣團隊，協助後端網頁架設，與美國研發總部共享技術，未來一同開發人工智慧與機器人深度學習。

PacSoft將會提供給您完整的訓練及工作上所使用到的資源，讓您與來自世界各地的菁英團隊共同合作，一起成長。未來有前往海外公司開發新產品的機會

1. Be responsible for website development
2. Analyze Word Text Document
3. Use Open Source OCR tools for integration into the web application
4. Be responsible for big data analysis products, and cloud server development
5. Design the logic algorithm of products, build models, develop Web Data Mining system
6. Build network data exploration algorithm
7. Optimize the crawler system to improve performance and stability 
8. Clean up the crawled data 
9. Query / statistics / analysis data

companyName: NVIDIA_香港商輝達香港控股有限公司台灣分公司
description:
NVIDIA Cloud platform engineering is looking for extraordinary DevOps infrastructure automation engineers to deliver our Nvidia GPU Cloud services. Be part of the team that delivers 100K+ automation runs per week 24x7 around the clock with thousands of automation projects. This is an unusual opportunity to work on multi-OSes, multi-cloud platforms and virtualization technologies at the same time.
We are looking for talented engineers who aren’t afraid of taking up new DevOps and cloud technologies, processes, and tools to make constant improvement on the automation infrastructure. You will collaborate closely with application developers and QA to build the world-class automation infrastructure for deployment, testing, monitoring and CI/CD operations.

What you'll be doing:
• Work with the latest AWS technologies such as CloudFormation, CodeDeploy, WAF, CloudFront to provision different cloud services.
• Work with different Configuration Management tools like Ansible and SaltStack to manage and deploy COLO multi-platform server clusters in Nvidia Data Centers around the world.
• You will design and develop different infrastructures, tools, and automation scripts to improve automation support for varies activities such as image management, deployment, data analytics, automated testing, logging, monitors and alerts for different micro-services.
• Work on container technologies like Docker for fast and consistent delivery.
• You will be the owner of infrastructure for micro-services and provide operation support to application teams such as automation service, infrastructure and security improvement, and live service troubleshooting.

jobName: 4443: Software Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer (AIM BA)
companyName: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
Overview 

Do you know how serious about Phishing mail threat to businesses? According to Verizon, 67% of cyber espionage begins with a phishing email, and numerous reports and white papers demonstrate massive increases in the rate and severity of cyber-attacks on organizations! Social engineering poses a significant risk to businesses, with phishing being a common tactic.


Employees are information security’s weakest link.

 

Phish Insight is a SaaS that provides a flexible cloud base service to simulate any modern social engineering attacks to enables employee security awareness from training. It's the fast, efficient way to measure employee vulnerability while ramping up awareness of the seriousness of the risk. We wish we become the biggest security awareness platform in the world to educate enterprise employees.

「You cannot save the world alone !」Join this team, you will be one of the heroes to protect the digital world. 


Job Responsibilities 


·         Engage in and improve the whole lifecycle of services—from inception and design, through deployment, operation and refinement.

·         Support services before they go live through activities such as system design consulting, developing software platforms and frameworks, capacity planning and launch reviews.

·         Maintain services once they are live by measuring and monitoring availability, latency and overall system health.

·         Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation, and evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.

·         Practice sustainable incident response and blameless postmortems.

companyName: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
Overview

 

DCS (Data Center Service) team provides hybrid cloud solutions in data center to empower Trend Micro global services. We are looking for creative & self-motivate talent to join as to build up world class cloud service platform. The staff engineer takes the responsibility to survey and study modern software technologies, plays the key role to select & design an end to end cloud management solution which fits the organization needs. The candidate should equip with solid technology background and rich experience. Hands-on experience in large scale software projects and system implementation is also the key criteria

 

Specific job responsibilities include:

 
1.Work closely with software developers to architect and develop technical designs, architectures and implementations.
2.Play as a technical leadership to make technical decision for scalable and reliable system design.
3.Renovate and modernize current software architecture design in the team. 
4.Research new software technology and open source frameworks with quick prototyping.
5.Design new solutions in hybrid cloud environment to deliver worry free infrastructure management solutions with great user experiences. 
6.Adopt agile principles to run the development life cycle for solution delivery.

companyName: Digital River_美商亞太數位潮流科技有限公司台灣分公司
description:
Founded in 1994, Digital River is recognized as a leading global provider of Commerce-as-a-Service solutions. Companies of all sizes rely on Digital River’s multi-tenant, SaaS commerce, payments and marketing services to manage and grow their online businesses. Digital River has helped companies process more than $30 billion in online transactions, connecting B2B and B2C digital products and cloud service companies as well as branded manufacturers with buyers across multiple devices and channels, and nearly every country in the world. 

We are fortunate at Digital River to work with some of the e-commerce industry’s brightest talent. We have professionals on the ground in nearly every region of the world, including North America, Europe, Asia and Australia. Our employees are experts in e-commerce, e-marketing, creative site design and merchandising, global tax and compliance laws, fraud prevention, international payments and more. To attract and retain the best-of-the-best, we invest a great deal of time and effort in creating a community that people want to be part of and high performance culture where they can grow. 

Momentum is what we have and growth is our plan. We are looking for people who are energized by making an impact, having autonomy in their work and who want the ability to look back at what they have accomplished and say “wow.” If you are someone who loves being part of a team that is more like a family and likes to work for companies at the top of their game, join Digital River.

 We are seeking a Principal Software Engineer in our Taipei, Taiwan office.

What You’ll Do:

The Principal Software Engineer should have excellent technical foundation in software design, development and has implemented various cloud based architectural solutions, additionally this role requires strong focus on machine learning, with practical experience with ML libraries, can dive into data and discover hidden patterns and solve real world business problems with data science.

•Analyze, design, build, test and deliver a full-stack system/solution that meets the necessary functional and non-functional requirements.
•Possess advanced technical knowledge and thorough understanding of most parts of the application and how changes impact the existing system.
•Build highly performant, scalable, interoperable, and testable services.
•Work in coordination with QA, Business Analysts, and Architects to develop services as per the overall product development plan.
•Design and implement data mining algorithm, conduct data analysis, utilize and train the right machine learning model to acquire insights from e-commerce data.
•Develop efficiency data mining pipelines and drive for better accuracy and coverage of the insight data which will be used by business to improve conversion ratio and other sales related rates.

description:
The NVIDIA Linux for Tegra software team is looking for a Senior System Software Engineer who will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge mobile computing technologies built around the Tegra SoC.


What you will be doing:
Ideal candidates will have a thorough understanding of Linux kernel internals, root file system, power management infrastructure, and contemporary power management architectures for system-on-chip designs, with strong C programming and system-level debugging experience. As a key member of the Linux for Tegra BSP (Board Support Package) team, you will work on:
• Work on various aspect of the BSP (Board Support Package) including kernel, root file system, and userspace applications.
• Help drive the security fixes that impact the Linux for Tegra BSP.
• Verify and improve system power and performance on the Tegra platforms, as well as setting power and performance target and work to achieve it.
• Work closely with different teams around the globe on the latest Tegra platforms.

description:

職務內容
1.協助資料研究，萃取並產出可供營運團隊決策使用之數據。
2.分析、詮釋使用者行為模式與偏好，進行用戶行為分析與預測。
3.規劃Data Pipeline，優化數據處理與分析流程。
4.數據視覺化與分析成果產出
5.從業務分析需求為出發點，主動挖掘問題並思考解決方案。
6.使用統計、數學、machine learning等方法挑戰商業活動的數據分析。

職涯規劃
身為資料科學團隊一員，將數位行銷、人力資源、以及集團各部門共同合作，培養專案管理與大數據處理、分析、洞察能力，用以提升產業應用層次、優化客戶體驗，最後成為具備多元思考與分析能力的資料科學家。

我們重視的特質及能力
具備主動學習新知的企圖心與能力，您需要具備探索數據的熱情與毅力，一次次重新處理與分析、，建模。要能規劃benchmark，尋找差異成因、最後建立觀察指標，讓數據驅動改變、讓成長有依有據，並樂於分享成果、持續優化流程。

description:
Overview: 

Trend Micro Incorporated, a global cloud security leader, creates a world safe for exchanging digital information with its Internet content security and threat management solutions for businesses and consumers. A pioneer in server security with over 25 years’ experience, we deliver top-ranked client, server and cloud-based security that fits our customers’ and partners’ needs, stops new threats faster, and protects data in physical, virtualized and cloud environments.

 

We are looking for DevOps talent .

Join our Service Delivery team under Information Service Group where you will work on new technologies and continuously help us to improve the service quality. You will use functional expertise to act as an advisor to management and make recommendations on more complex projects.

You will use professional concepts and company policies & procedures to solve a wide range of difficult problems creatively and practically.

You will be responsible for deployment and operations of Cloud enabled applications and services in AWS and Private Cloud infrastructure.

You will have experience with DevOps methodologies and will be working directly with application developers, guiding the development and implementation of Cloud applications, systems and processes.

You will use DevOps and agile principles, utilizing Jenkins,to enable CI / CD of various cloud applications. You will work independently on day to day monitoring and operations of cloud and legacy applications. You will be required to develop automation using scripting languages.

You will also be able to handle critical operation tasks as well as on demand requests.

 

 

Essential Functions:

Operations and administration of VMWare & AWS environment.

DevOps CI / CD integration using JIRA, Jenkins.

Scripting (BASH, Perl, Ruby) and building required automation and tools on an ad-hoc basis.

Setup new monitoring and automation of support for various cloud jobs and processes.

jobName: Software Engineer - IBM Security (職缺代碼: 112866BR)
companyName: IBM_台灣國際商業機器股份有限公司
description:
Software Engineer - IBM Security. Taipei, Taiwan.

Ready to change the way the world works?

This is your chance to develop innovative new technology products, as well as your career, with one of the world's largest and innovative technology companies! Hone your expertise alongside fellow talented professionals, where you'll develop some of the most exciting software solutions on the market. At IBM Security you’ll contribute to keeping the world safe and making a difference in millions of people’s lives - every day.
As an IBM Software Engineer, you'll use the latest tools and technologies available to deliver state-of-the-art software. Working in an Agile and DevOps environment, you'll be responsible for ensuring that software components are expertly designed, developed and deployed integration in a continuous delivery cycle.
The Content Security Solutions department delivers the technology powering the AntiSpam and AntiMalware capabilities of IBM Verse, IBM SmartCloud and multiple Enterprise products. Working as part of this team you will help build effective micro services, cloud-ready components and engage in end-to-end delivery of the solutions.

We are looking for people with a background in both Linux C++ and service development as well as new technologies such as Node.js, Docker and Angular. Results-based, quality-oriented thinking as well as a passion to engage in continuous learning is a must. Also The ability to connect and collaborate closely with your teammates and colleagues is a key success factor. We’re not hiring you solely for the skills you have now, but for your potential to grow, evolve and inspire.

companyName: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
description:
Appier's mission is to enable businesses via Appier's Artificial Intelligence (AI) products and services.
To create best-in-class AI products and services, all of our teams have access to learn and contribute to Appier's AI products and services-- regardless if engineer, marketing, or otherwise. Many come from Google, Intel, Yahoo, and renowned AI research groups from Harvard University and Stanford University.
Headquartered in Taiwan, Appier serves more than 500 global brands and agencies from offices in international markets including Singapore, Japan, Australia, Hong Kong, Vietnam, India, Indonesia and South Korea.

Job Description
As an Appier Tech Support Engineer, your role is to assist clients with integrating Appier AI technologies to achieve their business goals. You will also explain and conduct data analysis on business-critical metric investigations and system capabilities.

1. Help customers integrate Appier technologies into their websites/apps and utilize Appier AI services.
2. Communicate with client Account Managers/tech teams.
3. Understand customer requirements and effectively coordinate internal resources.
4. Stay up to date with current technology and apply it effectively.
5. Handle crisis and urgent issues.

jobName: 【信義房屋】資深數據工程師(Data Engineer) (熟悉數據平台建置佳)
companyName: 信義房屋仲介股份有限公司
description:
#新團隊擴編徵才，專職大數據整合加值與創新服務應用，歡迎對數據分析有熱情，期盼數據應用落地的好手加入。

職務內容
1.資料科學最新方法與工具應用與研究。
2.數據平台搭建： 使用AWS/GCP/Azure 或 hadoop/cloudera 建置數據處理平台。
3.大數據平台架構設計、建置，管理、維運與問題解決。
4.網路數位軌跡採集與清洗。
5.協助團隊建置數據處理流程 Data Pipeline、ETL及數據建模，自動化數據處理流程。
6.數據相關API開發與串接
7.大數據架構新技術探索及研究，評估專案方法與使用技術，提出合適的方案與建議。
8.使用統計，數學,機器學習等方法挑戰實際商業活動的數據分析。
9.配合公司運營策略，推動資料收集、個資安全等目標，並從中協助組織發展。

職涯發展
身為資料科學團隊一員，將數位行銷、人力資源、以及集團各部門共同合作，培養專案管理與大數據處理、分析、洞察能力，用以提升產業應用層次、優化客戶體驗，最後成為具備多元思考與分析能力的資料科學家。

我們重視的特質及能力
具備主動學習新知的企圖心與能力，您需要具備新應用自主規劃與研發能力，熟悉數據/雲端平台的操作與維運，並樂於分享與教導後進。

description:
Style.me aims to solve the pain points of online shopping by creating an innovative solution to accurately try on clothing before you buy. 

Senior C++ Software Engineer at Style.me focuses on improving our 3D scanning process and scalability of our virtual try-on platform. 

We are looking for the developer, will drive the automation of various processes and build software alongside and on top of our existing systems. Who will also get to work with advanced technology spanning computer graphics,computer vision, physics-based simulation, and our US-patented 3D geometry modeling algorithms. 

You are a master software engineer that can navigate complex systems and solve problems creatively, and will contribute tremendously to the success of our product launches in the US and then globally. 

Responsibilities: 
- Have a strong background in C++ development on a Linux platform and be comfortable working on a real-time platform 
- Have a good amount of experience working with low latency systems and ideally will have worked with various messaging protocols 
- Offer clean code and manage source version control

- Perform software acceptance testing and system level testing

description:
Nexusguard development team is seeking a cloud platform engineer who is responsible for the design and development of features and solutions deployed for the automated and containerized cloud application platform. The role will involve researching, prototyping, and developing technical solutions in addition to engineering responsibilities surrounding the overall platform itself.
In overall, the successful candidate is expected to:

companyName: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
Trend Micro Incorporated, a global cloud security leader, creates a world safe for exchanging digital information with its Internet content security and threat management solutions for businesses and consumers. A pioneer in server security with over 25 years’ experience, we deliver top-ranked client, server and cloud-based security that fits our customers’ and partners’ needs, stops new threats faster, and protects data in physical, virtualized and cloud environments.

Within our Information Security team, we need to have the best talents to help us continuously improve our security defenses against the ever changing threat landscape as well as responding to both opportunistic and targeted cyberattacks.

As a Cloud Security Architect, you will contribute in the overall strategy, design and development of security architecture for different types of public, private and hybrid cloud environment.

 

Responsibilities 

Lead security initiatives in gaining continuous visibility on cloud-based servers/applications and development of security controls in common cloud infrastructure

Perform design reviews to assess security risk and requirements for adoption of new technologies.

Proactively engage with senior management, product/service engineering and other technology teams to understand business goals and enterprise security needs.

Participate in continuous evaluation of security controls (technology or process) against the current threats

 

Minimum qualifications

Any Bachelor’s degree

At least 5 years’ experience as a Security Architect

At least 3 years’ experience in architecting solutions with Cloud IaaS/SaaS/PaaS providers such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Salesforce.com

Experience in working as part of a cross-functional team to implement solutions

Good verbal and written English communication skills that can level with different management and technical teams

Experience with continuous integration/continuous deployment (Git, Jenkins)  and configuration management (Ansible, Puppet, etc.)

Knowledge in broad set of on-premise and cloud security tools

Knowledge of leading edge technology in cloud architecture methods and practices and server virtualization technologies

Knowledge in multiple high-level programming language and scripting language

 

 

Preferred qualifications

Master’s degree with 8 or more years of enterprise security experience

Cloud Security related certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, AWS Certified DevOps Engineer

Experience with penetration testing and application security testing

Experience with computer forensics and incident response tools

Experience with use case development using ArcSight ESM or with any SIEM platform

#英文 #英語 #日商 #伺服器工程師

【企業簡介】
公司創立於2010年6月，在日本為IPO上市公司﹐公司名字蘊涵著「我們希望在藉由提供產品和服務的同時，除了對社會作出貢獻，

以台灣作為海外拓展事業據點第一站，台灣近一百名的員工來自各國，其包含日本、韓國、印度及荷蘭等。 工作環境優良並且更多次榮獲Great Place to Work(R) Institute Japan Best Company殊榮。

台灣公司人數近一百人


【魅力】
嶄新的辦公室以及舒適的休憩空間，可說是極優的工作環境。進軍台灣三年，以極快的速度成長。日本總公司也在設立五年後成為上市公司。
在台公司採用各國國籍員工，因此可以在國際化的環境中工作，日文能力也能確實提升。

companyName: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
Overview

We are looking for talents to drive positive business change using your coding skills over cutting edge technologies for cloud, virtualization, service orchestration, automation and web services.
Dedicated to work within the Product Cloud Team by scaling and expanding our infra and systems to provide next generation application and services to Sales, Support, Training and Channel Partners.
 
The responsibilities:
- Work intensively to design, develop and roll out web applications, APIs and workflows to deliver innovative solutions as part of “Product Cloud” on a global scale
- Contribute to the design, implementation and integration of the cloud-based infrastructure with corporate systems and 3rd party solutions, coding back-end and/or front-end components
- Contribute to company-wide virtual teams and functional communities

 

Qualification/Requirement

You are:                                                                             
- Entrepreneurial, creative, self-driving and highly-motivated, with a “can-do” and always positive approach
- Service-oriented to use IT as a business accelerator, with a broad knowledge across different technologies to build turnkey solutions for our customers and business partners
- Organized and able to manage your time effectively, willing to work out of business hours if needed to support major projects on a global scale
- Friendly and approachable with colleagues and customers, excellent in verbal and written communication, open minded and creative 
You have: 
- Expertise in developing and/or integrating web services using APIs (RESTful or SOAP)
- Solid expertise coding with one or more languages like NodeJS, Angular2, HTML5, XCSS and Javascript
- Strong knowledge in the following technical areas with specialization in at least two: Coding, Scripting, Containerization, Platform integration, IT Automation, Database, Virtualization, Cloud (Public, Private or Hybrid).
- Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related area, or >5 years related IT or coding/developer experience
- Hands on experience with strong troubleshooting and analytical skills
- Demonstrated ability to execute and deliver results keeping a friendly attitude and approach when working under pressure

companyName: TomTom Asia_通騰科技股份有限公司
description:
Our office is just opposite to the Taipei Main station! 
Take it easy in the morning, arrival anytime before 10AM is ok.

In Taipei we are looking for a (Agile) C++ developer to join our Qt Navigation UI team. TomTom is the leading Agile software development company in Taiwan.
 
Here are some of the user stories we work on
• As a driver, I want to avoid road block ahead of my route.
• As a developer, I want to have Arabic framework for right to left reading.
• As a driver, I want to have online parking availability information.

What’s a must
• Amazing C++ coding, framework, architecture, design skills and passion to learn more.
• Be proactive and like to make decisions.
• Speak your mind, ask questions and share ideas. Even when people do not ask, you like to share what you know.

What’s nice to have
• Good object-orientated software design abilities.
• Experience with creating rich GUI applications by using Qt technologies.
• Knowledge of modern UI framework (Android, iOS, HTML5).
• Know how to develop on Linux and cross-platform development.
• Professional experience in using unit test frameworks.
• Thorough understanding of the intricacies and pitfalls of multithreaded programming.
• Analytical skills to determine and improve the testability of development deliverables and to find root causes and solutions for detected issues.

What can you expect from us
• Freedom, fun, no hierarchy!
• The opportunity to get paid as a manager, yet work hands-on as an expert developer.
• We move fast like a “start-up” but have the benefits of a billion euro company. 
• Team outings, innovation days, indefinite contract, flexible benefits, minimum 15 annual leave days, statutory insurances, group insurance, health check,  pension scheme, up to 50% discount on products, bonus scheme and International relocation package (if applicable).

We have been making built-in car navigation since 2008, introduced the connected car in 2010 and are a major player in the area of highly automated driving. And, we are not slowing down. Join us

Please apply through www.tomtom.com/careers. The reference to this job is 24471.

Pre-employment screening and coding tests of all external candidates is part of the selection process. Feel free to send us a piece of code to show your skills.

目前我們正招聘 IoT應用軟體工程師，主要工作內容以Node.js 應用運行在Linux為主、輔以IoT產品應用整合及雲端大數據分析(前端以JavaScript 及 RWD 方法，開發 React 框架的手機與網站應用)。請參閱網站: www.ekopro.solutions。
 
海韻電子工業股份有限公司為具40年歷史之上市櫃公司(股票代號:6203)是一家全球電源領導品牌的上櫃公司，為全球第一家榮獲美國80PLUS認證的電源供應器廠商。在電競市場擁有頂尖的地位與玩家最高的評價，敬請參閱我們的網站及眾多評鑑網站。
 
我們的育成新創公司(昊博國際服務有限公司, eKoPro)於2015年成立，結合物聯網 Internet of Things (IoT)與人工智慧，致力於研發智慧環境、能源管理專業控制技術。eKoPro智慧環境控制技術透過硬體之間相互連接溝通，並結合環境感知運算進行當前環境自我控制，各硬體設備間可透過網路進行遠端間的資料溝通，即時且可靠地與遠端設備通訊。還可隨時透過移動裝置輕鬆進行遠端監測、優化環境控制，提供遠端維護、遠端診斷與遠端監控解決方案。eKoPro能源管理控制透過數位電源系統管理技術降低電源管理複雜度，提升控制精確性。 eKoPro數位電源系統管理技術方便系統監控管理，可實現智慧電源管理、確保能源效率，從而提高能效，輕鬆實現綠色能源管理機制。海韻集團近年積極進行產業整併規劃，產銷分離、專業分工，並設立國際商業通路平台Cornerstone ，強化行銷、通路服務！eKoPro藉由Cornerstone在地化的業務、行銷、通路建構和物流，提供完整的品牌行銷服務，前進全球市場。藉著穩定又紮實的團隊，成功地將eKoPro的品牌推向全球市場，與國際接軌。eKoPro以尖端的人才，明確的市場定位和產品特色，及公司雄厚的財力支援，期望短期內在物聯網領域佔有一席之地，並規劃於數年內股票上市櫃。
 
雖然需才孔急，我們仍然堅持只羅致一流人才與我們共創大業，附件為職缺介紹請您參考。
若您有意願進一步瞭解我們公司，麻煩告知您方便的時間，以便我們安排雙方見面談談，也許這是您一生中最不容錯過的機會!
 
Thanks & best regards  
海韻電子管理處敬上
 
高效率電源領導者  海韻電子  請參閱網站:   http://www.seasonic.com
國際商業通路平台  Cornerstone  請參閱網站: http://www.cornerstone-enterprise.com/

companyName: 美商超微半導體股份有限公司台灣分公司
description:
What you do at AMD changes everything 


At AMD, we push the boundaries of what is possible.  We believe in changing the world for the better by driving innovation in high-performance computing, graphics, and visualization technologies – building blocks for gaming, immersive platforms, and the data center. 


Developing great technology takes more than talent: it takes amazing people who understand collaboration, respect, and who will go the “extra mile” to achieve unthinkable results.  It takes people who have the passion and desire to disrupt the status quo, push boundaries, deliver innovation, and change the world.   If you have this type of passion, we invite you to take a look at the opportunities available to come join our team.

 

Senior/MTS/SMTS Graphics Software Development Engineer – KMD and Display

 

You will be part of RTG (Radeon Technologies Group) SW Customer Engineering team working on various Windows kernel mode software components i.e. KMD, Power and Display technologies for APU/GPU products and fixing problems from OEM/ODM customers to ensure the quality of software deliverables on-time to customers.

 

Key Responsibilities:

• Work closely with global RTG Software teams and Customer Engineering teams to provide support and solution for the enablement of the next generation of APU/GPU products and Windows operating systems to OEM/ODM customers.

• Resolve problems related to Windows graphics driver including triaging, debugging and fixing problems from customers. Have a strong emphasis on meeting customer requirements regarding features and schedules.

• Specify, design and implement new ASIC, OS and software features.

• Coordinate closely with peers both locally and internationally to ensure timely and effective communication of all assigned work activities.

• Coach and mentor less experienced staffs. Influence others as a technical leader.

 

Requirement:

• MS+ degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, Engineering or an equivalent.

• Experience in software debugging on Windows operating system and familiar with kernel debug tools such as windbg.

• Programming device drivers under Windows or Linux environment.

• Minimum industry experience (Master: 3~5 yrs; PhD: 1+ yr).

• C/C++ programming (5+ yrs). Object-oriented design and programming (5+ yrs).

• A self-motivated team player.

• Good communication skill and able to work with stakeholders effectively.

• Knowledge of Graphics, Display and Multimedia technologies is a plus.

jobName: 八寶網路廣播 後端工程師
companyName: 八寶數位媒體有限公司
salary: 月薪 6萬5仟元 至 8萬5仟元
description:
八寶網路廣播是一個獨一無二的網路廣播服務， 
我們的目標是打造一個人和人之間能夠互相聆聽、了解、對話的空間。 
八寶提供免費自由的空間，讓有興趣的廣播製作人能夠製作各式各樣的有聲節目， 
八寶同時也服務聽眾，讓聽眾可以以最快速度找到自己想聽的節目。 
八寶的目標是成為線上內容最多元、最具影響力的有聲平台。 

如果你… 
熱愛挑戰，有想法，愛學習， 
自律性高， 
喜歡團體合作， 
希望彈性大、自由度高的工作環境， 
能夠適應新創反應速度快、一人必須分飾多角， 
對改變台灣媒體生態充滿想法，希望聽到更多不同多元的聲音， 

如果你… 
對台灣數位媒體也充滿理想，歡迎來和我們一起實現夢想。 

Who we are: 

Baabao is a one of a kind internet audio service. 
Our goal is to build an online audio service for the modern age. 
Listeners can choose from Baabao's ever expanding audio inventory and 
listen anytime, anywhere for free. 
Show hosts and listeners can also share a conversation and connect on a 
personal level through Baabao. 
Baabao, Inc is backed by one of the largest radio network in Taiwan 
so not only are we financially stable we also have direct access to talents and 
private know-hows into the radio business. 

We are looking for someone: 

+Passionate about building something original. 
+Driven and self-discipline 
+Who loves a good challenge and always eager to learn. 
+Works well in a team setting. 
+An expert at wearing many heats 
+Flexible and adaptable to a dynamic working situation. 

Responsibilities: 

As a Backend Engineer ready to use all your skill, 
from server config/deploy to backend API design/impl to power the next 
generation audio platform, 
creating/improving applications for both producers and listeners. 
You also need to keep improve yourself and share your knowledge with the team. Let’s grow together. 


Requirement: 

2+ years of backend-end development experience. 

Experience Django 

Experience with AWS service (ec2, rds, s3, route53, sqs, dynamoDB) 

Experience deploy/config tool (prefer Ansible, but not limited) 

Experience with RDBMS (prefer Postgresql) and NoSQL (prefer DynamoDB, but not limited) 

Experience with Git 

Experience in collaborating with frontend developers to design APIs. 

Experience in developing high performance web applications 


Bonus (nice to have): 

Familiar with Javascript (TypeScript / ES6) 

Experience in modern front-end framework (prefer Vue/Vuex but not limited, such as React/Redux) 

Experience with CI / CD 

Scrum, TDD experience 

Perks: 

所有大公司的福利如完整勞健保、退休金、福委會都有 

彈性上下班時間 

不須加班 

國內外員工旅遊 

每月都有慶生會 

組織扁平 

上班可以聽廣播

自律性高， 
喜歡團體合作， 
希望彈性大、自由度高的工作環境， 
能夠適應新創反應速度快、一人必須分飾多角， 
對改變台灣媒體生態充滿想法，希望聽到更多不同多元的聲音， 

如果你… 
對台灣數位媒體也充滿理想，歡迎來和我們一起實現夢想。 

Who we are: 

Baabao is a one of a kind internet audio service. 
Our goal is to build an online audio service for the modern age. 
Listeners can choose from Baabao's ever expanding audio inventory 
and listen anytime, anywhere for free. 
Show hosts and listeners can also share a conversation and connect on a personal level through Baabao. 
Baabao, Inc is backed by one of the largest radio network in Taiwan 
so not only are we financially stable 
we also have direct access to talents and 
private know-hows into the radio business. 

We are looking for someone: 

+Passionate about building something original. 
+Driven and self-discipline 
+Who loves a good challenge and always eager to learn. 
+Works well in a team setting. 
+An expert at wearing many heats 
+Flexible and adaptable to a dynamic working situation. 

Responsibilities: 
As a Full Stack Engineer you will be ready to use all your skill, 
from server config/deploy to backend API design/impl 
to modern frontend develop to power the next generation audio platform, 
creating/improving applications for both producers and listeners. 
You also need to keep improve yourself and 
share your knowledge with the team. 
Let's grow together. 

Requirement: 
3+ years of web development experience. 

Experience with Django 

Experience with AWS service (ec2, rds, s3, route53, sqs) 

Experience deploy/config tool (prefer Ansible, but not limited) 

Experience with RDBMS (prefer PostgreSQL, but not limited) and NoSQL (prefer DynamoDB, but not limited) 

Familiar with Javascript (TypeScript / ES6) 

Experience in modern front-end framework (prefer Vue/Vuex but not limited, such as React/Redux) 

Experience with Git 

Experience in design and implement APIs. 

Experience in developing high performance web applications 

Bonus: 

Experience with CI / CD 

Scrum, TDD experience 

Perks: 

所有大公司的福利如完整勞健保、退休金、福委會都有 

彈性上下班時間 

不須加班 

國內外員工旅遊 

每月都有慶生會 

組織扁平 

上班可以聽廣播

companyName: 香港商睿智通有限公司台灣分公司
description:
We are looking for scientist level of engineer to integrate voice recognition solutions into our innovative robot. The ideal candidate should have the following: 
1. Deep knowledge of current machine learning techniques 
2. Have knowledge of current mechanism behind siri, alexa commercialized voice recognition engine 
3. Motivated and research-oriented mind-set 
4, Handles office speech recognizer and wake up word function /Text To Speech function, this is related to Speech processing part.
5• Implement an on-board processing chain that provides STT and TTS services
6• Enhance the STT and TTS software to support multi-modal elements (e.g indexical gestures)
        
 
This role can grow to include work on human-robot dialogue interaction, in conjunction with Aeolus staff.
 
You will work in a scrum-based agile development cycle. You will be working alongside founders, researchers, and engineers to design and build first-generation robotic solutions for mass consumer adoption.

You will be measured by deliverables (software features, quality of the testing and validation process, velocity of replying to emerging needs).
 
Experience:
• 2+ years experience with SPEECH technologies
 
Mandatory Requirements:
• Significant SPEECH experience
• Track record showing both solution design and development skills
• Strong familiarity with STT and TTS tools and technologies
• Strong C++ skills (in Linux)
 
 Preferred Requirements:
• Experience with dialogue interaction systems
• Experience with multi-modal linguistic interaction
• Experience in gesture recognition
• Experience in embedded systems

If you are interested in this position, please join us!!

jobName: 嵌入式軟體工程師 Embedded Software Engineer
companyName: 加拿大商英傳信科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
description:
英傳信科技是個充滿了挑戰,活力及以先進技術為基礎的新產品設計公司。
英傳信科技協同全球領先的科技公司及供應商密切合作採用最尖端的技術來創造下一代智能連接產品。應用創新產品涵蓋了機器人、穿戴式裝置、車用電子、醫療、視訊會議、數位標牌、虛擬實境、工業電腦和數位相機等等。
我們目前正在尋求具有開發Android和Linux經驗的嵌入式軟體工程師，特別是在Android框架，HAL和Linux kernel領域。
該嵌入式軟體工程師必須擁有強大的技術背景，並能夠迅速趕上新團隊的速度。清楚的分析，解決問題和溝通能力是團隊合作能力的關鍵。
此職位需要有最少三年的開發和調試Linux kernel產品驅動程序的經驗。擁有相機和顯示器驅動程式技術經驗為優先考量。

主要職責：
•負責Android和Linux的程式開發工作，包括客戶端技術建議和指導。
•迅速融入團隊，提供技術支援,成為經驗豐富的嵌入式軟件工程師團隊中的一員。
•解決問題，並針對各種Linux kernel驅動程序，Android框架的HAL（包括從顯示器，USB，藍牙，到無線網絡）提供技術支援。
•及時掌握最新技術，並與團隊成員合作解決問題及設計。
•設計或修改Android的底層程序及硬件抽象層（HAL）的功能
Key Responsibilities:
• Assist the development of Android and Linux based devices.
• Quickly ramp up and become a key contributor within a team of experienced Embedded software engineers.
• Fixes issues and provides technical guidance on a wide range of Linux Kernel drivers and Android framework HALs from camera to display to USB to Bluetooth to WiFI.
• Stays abreast of technical area and collaborates on issues and designs with fellow team members.
• Designs or modifies Hardware Abstraction Libraries for Android support of low-level device features.

資格要求：
•三年以上嵌入式Linux kernel驅動程式開發經驗。 Android的工作經驗優先。
•三年以上的C / C ++經驗。 Java經驗對申請有幫助，但並不是必需的。
•計算機科學，電子/軟件工程學士學位或同等學歷。更高學歷優先考慮。 
•良好的領導能力和溝通技巧，（口頭和書面） 。
•豐富的驅動程式整合經驗。至少包括以下驅動程式之一：HDMI/MIPI DSI顯示器, MIPI CSI相機, Linux 動態電源管理等等。具多媒體和電話系統相關經驗者優先。
•熟悉嵌入式系統或可攜式裝置的軟體開發。
•擁有快速診斷和解決問題的技能。
•對軟體開發和專案管理生命週期有深入了解。
•語言：良好的國語和英語水準，說寫流利

Qualifications: 
• Minimum 3 years Embedded software development experience in Linux kernel drivers. Android experience is highly desirable.
• Minimum 3 years of C/C++ experience. Java experience useful, but not required.
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, electrical/software engineering or equivalent. Advanced technical degree desirable.
• Requires strong leadership and communication skills (written and verbal).
• Experience in the integration and coding of a wide range of drivers, including at least one complex driver technology (HDMI/MIPI display, CSI camera, Linux dynamic power management, etc). Multimedia and telephony experience desirable.
• Good working knowledge of embedded or mobile devices.
• Good problem-solving and diagnostic skills, in a fast-paced environment.
• Requires a solid understanding of the software development and project management life cycle.
• Language: Strong written and spoken Mandarin and English required.

description:
目前Pixnet擁有7.1億文章及每日770萬讀者，所以本職缺很需要使用資料處理技術來處理本站的大量及不同資料。故對於資料結構、作業系統及平行處理有一定認識及瞭解。
在來是本職位也負責演算法模型的產品化、如果對於機器學習有基本的了解會是一個加分項目。

主要工作如下：
•將演算模型給予產品化，針對系統效能其穩定度做最大提升。
•設定並實作API，並符合站內某些高流量需求。
•設定並實作Data Pieline，將不同來源及不同特性的資料，給予統一整理和歸納。
•系統維運：自動化部署及設計監控機制，確保線上的演算法及服務能穩定持續運作。

演算法資料團隊 介紹 - https://goo.gl/SryrIZ

description:
阿福管家的App有點特別, 因為同一個App包含了監控系統的攝影機端以及給保全警衛看的監控端, 攝影機端的程式像是一個用來控制設備, 必須時時刻刻運作不出錯的嵌入式軟體, 而監控端是一個注重友善介面與效能的多媒體串流軟體.

作為一個iOS App工程師, 阿福管家可以讓你接觸到相機模組, 分散式影像處理, 多媒體編解碼與軟/硬體加速, 影像串流, P2P通訊, 雲端錄影/Turn server, IOT通訊協議, 終端省電模式, 行動廣告, 行動支付, 使用者數據分析...等等.

不論你已經身經百戰, 還是職場新鮮人, 我們都歡迎你/妳加入我們, 這裡有高手可以一同切磋, 一同成長.

Job description: 
1. Design, implement and deploy new product features/enhancements on iOS platform 
2. Integrate 3rd-party SDKs and web-services 
3. Identify and correct/improve stability and/or performance issues in existing iOS products 
4. Analyze/Interpret analytic data collected and provide feedbacks for product planning 
5. Create product proof-of-concept designs or prototypes 
6. Create reliable, efficient and maintainable implementations 
7. Work as a good team player and cowork with other members in the development team closely to achieve defined goals 
8. Work smart and efficiently and keep communicating with coworkers and supervisors 
9. Make contributions which could potentially help improve R&D operational efficiency or make better products

description:

# 產品簡介
https://www.goyomoney.com.tw/
【購有錢】，也就是：「購物就有錢」的意思，只要透過【購有錢】前往合作網路商城購物！就可享有現金回饋！回饋金額無上限，現金領出最方便！

【使命】
讓網路購物變得更有趣，讓購物開心，現金回饋領的更開心！

【緣起】
宇匯力推現金回饋服務的原因：「現金回饋在歐美盛行多年，台灣電商林立，相關服務卻付之闕如，電商少了一個強而有力的行銷模式，很可惜。」宇匯知識科技總經理周培林進一步解釋，推出『購有錢』是為了創造「消費者」和「電商」雙贏的生意模式。電商計算商品毛利後，即可決定每筆訂單回饋給消費者的比例，當訂單實際成立，電商才須支付行銷成本；消費者則因為購物有好處，提高購買動機，結果是，電商行銷成本受到控制、訂單增加，而消費者達到更省錢的目的。

# 希望的人格特質：
- 對電子商務平台不排斥，樂意面對形形色色顧客的意見與需求
- 對新事物接受度高，不怕學習
- 對程式設計有熱誠，喜歡探索程式，樂於交流
- 對自己的 code 負責

jobName: 701:【Machine Learning Expert - 現代福爾摩斯‧Your time to shine~】
companyName: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
‧ 你對機器學習、分散式系統有源源不絕的熱忱嗎?
‧ 你擁有打不死的好奇心，喜歡耐著性子追根究底嗎?
‧ 你擅長靈活思考與行動，不斷探索、驗證與思考如何突破瓶頸?

我們正尋找擁有這樣特質的你……一起扮演現代福爾摩斯，加入趨勢科技Core Tech Holmes Project!

在這個團隊，你可以~
* 悠遊於千萬筆的Real Data中，分析全球網路使用者行為及日新月異的病毒資料
* 從龐雜無盡的資料中找出潛在的抽象規則，依據數據結果設計並建構模型來提供解決方案、預測使用者/病毒行為
* 透過與其他軟體研發人員的合作，參與趨勢核心threat projects, 提升資安相關的技術和問題處理流程，以增加技術的廣度

利用  Machine Learning及Deep Learning ，讓我們一起來訓練智慧的科技腦。透過資料學習，不斷調整模型的構成，抽絲剝繭，從平凡中挖掘黑暗威脅的跡象。讓我們一起來發揮資料的技術力，在巨人的肩膀上發現問題的脈絡，創造AI大未來!

Welcome to join us! Be one of our Holmes!


Seeking for candidate who is able to create scalable solution by applying machine learning techniques for customer-facing problems.

1. Will be dealing with huge amount of data to identify new type of fast-changing internet threat
2. Will closely work with development team to express the novelty ideas and turn it into productive solution to solve the real world case.
3. Will closely communicate with Operation and Field Support to understand customer-facing problems and optimize the machine learning techniques to solve customer’s problem
4. Will research on innovative machine learning technique that could solve real world challenging cases

Yahoo! Gemini Engineering team is looking for an experienced, self-motivated, and passionate software engineer to work on building the next generation Search/Native advertising product.  

* Minimum Requirements:
Master Degree in Computer Science or related Engineering discipline.
At least 2-5+ years of web application or system development experience.

紐沃科技股份有限公司為台法合資企業，總部設立在台灣。
本公司致力於研發Wifi娛樂設備，外銷之產品可使超過五十名消費者透過智慧手機、平板同時免費收看數位電視與多影音串流。
產品應用於公共運輸與公共地點(公車、火車、飛機、車站、餐廳、酒吧等)，並透過與國際無線業者(陸上電台、衛星)合作取得正版內容，讓使用者無須操心檔案上傳、下載、版權等瑣事。
我們的企業合作夥伴多為歐、美、亞國際知名電視、衛星廣播公司，本公司誠摯邀請您成為我們的一員。

Job Description:

You are not expected to know all technologies above but at least meet the basic requirements shows below.
You may participate in either front-end or become a full stack developer if you want.

companyName: Viscovery_創意引晴股份有限公司
description:
亞洲影像辨識先驅Viscovery現正招募中！
只要你符合以下條件，自認學習力強、願意接受挑戰，Viscovery歡迎你的加入！

Responsibilities
· Perform research to make reinforcement learning more applicable to                     real world problems.
· Provide research consultancy on applied projects: determine the scope
  of the problem, the best place to apply machine learning, and                               evaluate different approaches.
· Interface with product teams to identify potential new problem areas                     for future projects.
· Integrate new fundamental research ideas into applied projects.
· Collaborate with Software Engineers to design and run experiments,                    including designing and evaluating new algorithms as well as                               implementing known algorithms.
· Report and present experimental results and research findings clearly
  and efficiently, both internally and externally.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Viscovery是亞洲影像辨識軟體公司的先驅，我們的足跡遍佈台灣、上海、北京和新加坡，現在正在尋找有共同願景的夥伴加入我們的團隊！
我們要讓世界看到台灣的軟體實力，只要你學習力強、有能力，歡迎你一起和我們在世界的舞台發光發熱！
As Asia's pioneering Visual recognition software company, Viscovery have partners all over Asia - Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing and Singapore.
Now we're looking for people who share our vision, who is seeking for challenges and is not afraid of changes. Take this opportunity, be part of us!
Be Vibrant, be Visionary, be Viscovery!

jobName: Software Developer, Blockchain - Coinful (a Nogle Venture)
companyName: Nogle Taiwan Limited_諾傑股份有限公司
description:
Nogle, as a Venture Studio provides what every venture needs. We develop multiple ventures simultaneously- focusing on building innovative technology solutions and turning them into sustainable businesses. 

Coinful is one of the fast growing Nogle ventures focusing on blockchain and cryptocurrency. We deploy algorithmic trading strategies through our automated trading platform which connects to all the major cryptocurrency exchanges and manages cryptocurrency mining operation.

We are looking for talents who enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and able to embrace the rapid change with us; being part of the “doer” team in translating ideas into actionable items. We believe that successes and failures are equally shared by all of us in this respectively diversify and cross-cultural workplace. You will have an opportunity to immerse yourself in working with top professionals and carry out what you desire to achieve your career aspiration. 

As a Software Developer, Blockchain, you will build this venture from the ground up along with our world-class tech team from Nogle. Expect to get your hands dirty from designing and building mining rigs, developing software to improve operation efficiencies, to reading EIPs, implementing the ethereum smart contracts in Solidity, and even designing, creating, and issuing new coins with us. This is a unique opportunity for someone to learn all about blockchain and cryptocurrencies with accelerated career growth within a young startup.

Responsibilities:
- Research hardware components and be an expert on hashrate, heat dissipation, overclocking and power efficiency
- Configure hardware, systems, and mining software to mine various cryptocurrencies at maximum efficiency
- Scale our mining and trading operation by designing automation and monitoring tools for our ground team and trading team
- Research the ERC20 tokens, Solidity, Zk-Snarks and keep track of various new technologies in the cryptocurrency space
- Continue to improve all aspects of our hardware and software stack in this new endeavor

We are forming a new Performance Engineering team at Style.me to focus on improving our 3D scanning process and scalability of our virtual try-on platform. 
As the Lead Developer, you will drive the automation of various processes and build software alongside and on top of our existing systems. You will 
also get to work with advanced technology spanning computer graphics, 
computer vision, physics-based simulation, and our US-patented 3D 
geometry modeling algorithms. 
This is a position that will contribute tremendously to the success of our 
product launches in the US and then globally. If you are a master 
software engineer that can navigate complex systems and solve problems 
creatively, then we would love to talk to you. 

Responsibilities: 
- Lead a team of talented engineers to build tools for managing and 
scaling our 3D scanning process and our virtual try-on platform 
- Be both a technical hands-on coder and people manager 
- Work with the product teams to find the optimal way to scale our 
systems 
- Provide technical leadership and guidance to your team and project 
peers 
- Automate data validation, quality control, and client integration 
workflows 
- Solve the hardest software performance issues: Work with software 
developers closely to improve code base performance (e.g. algorithm redesign) and shorten request latency 
- Develop tools to monitor billions of try-ons: Write monitoring and 
reporting tools to do performance-related tests and analysis 
- Identify bottleneck issues proactively and work with systems, network 
and engineering teams to discover resolutions

jobName: Quant Trading Developer/ Trader - Coinful (a Nogle venture)
companyName: Nogle Taiwan Limited_諾傑股份有限公司
description:
Nogle, as a Venture Studio provides what every venture needs. We develop multiple ventures simultaneously- focusing on building innovative technology solutions and turning them into sustainable businesses. 

Coinful is one of the fast growing Nogle ventures focusing on blockchain and cryptocurrency. We deploy algorithmic trading strategies through our automated trading platform which connects to all the major cryptocurrency exchanges and manages cryptocurrency mining operation.

We are looking for talents who enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and able to embrace the rapid change with us; being part of the “doer” team in translating ideas into actionable items. We believe that successes and failures are equally shared by all of us in this respectively diversify and cross-cultural workplace. You will have an opportunity to immerse yourself in working with top professionals and carry out what you desire to achieve your career aspiration. 

As a quant trading developer, you will operate both as a trader and a developer by researching your own trading approaches as well as implementing and improving existing ones. You function well under pressure and enjoy working in a fast paced environment. Most importantly, you are as excited about trading cryptocurrencies as we are!

Responsibilities
- Automate research and optimize trading process development
- Implement strategic algorithms and manage production lifecycle
- Conduct simulations to test performance outcome
- Enhance trading and platform code to ensure production efficiency

companyName: 紅檜科技有限公司
description:
Job Summary
In this highly visible role, you will have the responsibility of providing solutions that enable end-to-end monitoring of all systems, ensure exceptional end user Quality of Experience and Quality of Service and to ensure all clients are provided with correct and functional software, hardware and infrastructure thereby enabling them to perform their tasks and achieve the business objectives. You will utilize your deep understanding of developing and maintaining monitoring, alerting, and metrics gathering/analysis systems for compute clusters, storage systems, networks, web infrastructure & applications, database servers, and directory services. You will utilize your extensive communication skills to interface with internal teams, enabling world-class product development.
Technical Outputs
Shows Initiative/Innovation
• Implements improved IT processes that have a positive effect on the team's performance or the company's objectives.
• Maintains a long-term focus and does not wait until having to respond to a demand. Problems and opportunities are anticipated and dealt with immediately.
• Takes an active involvement in problem resolution and where necessary works after hours to ensure that issues are resolved.
• Shows foresight to prevent errors or delays in projects / deployments.
• Have the ability and willingness to learn new skills and technologies.
 
Completes Projects
 
• Completes all project work / allocated tasks on time / as per agreed schedule and communicates progress with all parties concerned.
• Takes on additional, unplanned projects as required by the business and works after hours where necessary.

companyName: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
description:
如果你著迷於處理巨量資料，加入趨勢就是你大展身手的好機會，在趨勢龐大的軟體架構下，有千萬筆巨量資料等著你，你將在團隊中扮演重要角色，將資料串接進系統，以巨量資料分析領頭，與資料分析師 (Data Analyst) 合作，洞察客戶意圖、掌握消費者需求，提供決策致勝關鍵。

[Job Content]  

• Design, implement, and enrich data processing pipeline that collect and process massive volume of data, to enhance Trend Micro solutions/services, protect our customers, and prepare data environment for data insight on business.
• Investigate and resolve performance and stability issues in data processing systems and advise necessary infrastructure changes
• Select and integrate data tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities
• By hacking big data to explore hundreds of real data collected from world-wide continuously, to get insight and discover new emergency threats.
• Work closely with client application engineering teams, Data Analysts, marketing and business operation team for archiving business objectives.

[Challenge/Achievement/Growth] 
• 資料工程師是開發團隊的顧問，要能從資料中洞悉出客戶需求及市場走向，給產品下一步設計上或行銷上的建議。 
• 資料工程師在提供產品設計概念的階段扮演重要的角色，將和專案經理(Project Manager)有許多產品開發概念的討論，和研發經理(RD Manager)共同定義產品架構和規格。因此，專案經理及研發經理都是資料工程師未來的發展方向之一。
• 有機會參與網路威脅防範(Threat)相關專案，提升資安技術，增加技術的廣度，更可以磨練及學習各種處理資料的新技術方法，提出Solution Architect等級的分析建議和解決方案。

• Consumer – WSE (Web Service Engineering) Backend Team
• NTDTG – IoT Reputation Service

To join the passionate team determined to make Alfred one of the best home security experience in the market.

In this job you will be mainly co-working with the in-house server-side developers to continue enhancing the platform with new features and performance/cost improvements, as well as maximizing the operational availability/scalability of the cloud service. description:
因為您需要：

所以我們正在找符合下面條件的您：
1. 熟悉 JAVA(Spring，Servlet，JSP(JSTL標籤、EL標籤))
2. 熟悉 MySQL，除了ORM外，也可以根據需求或系統效能撰寫SQL指令碼。如果其他人很忙，也要能任務需求自行規劃、設計資料結構。

4. 版本控制（Git, SVN），永遠保持紀錄，受益的通常也都是自己啊。
5. 熟悉Restful-API，因為我們的系統是要給很多人用的。
6. 熟悉 HTML, CSS, JavaScript，當然 jQuery還是一個好幫手。
7. 程式的世界每天都有新鮮事，我們希望您不滿於現狀，能夠在閒暇之餘多多接觸新東西。（我聽到您的碎念，相信我，這個時間真的蠻多的）
8. 對自己的作品感到驕傲，卻又覺得可以變得更好。

好吧，
除了1,2,3,4是必備的武器外，
其他的都可以透過實戰來快速累積，
如果這也是你追求的，
請來跟我們聊一聊吧。

jobName: 嵌入式軟體工程師 Embedded Software Engineer
companyName: 阿福股份有限公司
description:
You will be joining the team destined to make Alfred one of the best home monitoring experience available in the market.

You will become a member of the development team who are capable of working on different platforms to enhance the features for Alfred as a whole. You will work on new product line-ups as well incorporating new technologies into the platform in order to facilitate the rapid growth of the company. You will also need to integrate various 3rd-party software modules, creating your own implementation based on specification, address interoperability issues between platforms and write specification/design documents in English.

Instead of calling Alfred a mobile app, you may as well think of Alfred as a piece of embedded software that controls devices. Essentially, we put the software in the form of an app in smartphones so that we can use them as security cameras!

To achieve this is no small feat. We use a blend of languages including Swift, Java, C language, and ARM assembly to control from CPU to GPU. We research CPU instructions and OS pipelines so that Alfred can run on older phones (dating back 7-8 years) to deliver the best multimedia performance.

Alfred is the only app that runs 24/7 a day and 365 days a year. Alfred doesn’t take a break. Alfred can’t make any mistakes. It is our job to make sure that Alfred can run on over 20,000 phone models and function perfectly.

A large part of Alfred’s challenge lies in the fact that we do not have the luxury to inspect users’ devices. That is why the Alfred team has to learn how to serve users, overcome these challenges, work in different conditions, and optimize user experience. Would you take on this challenge with us?

companyName: 泰鼎網路安全科技有限公司_Nexusguard Limited
description:
JOB PURPOSE
System Reliability Engineers are hybrid systems and software engineers who are responsible and take ownership for reliability, automation, and other issues related to keeping the service uptime in Nexusguard foundation. SREs are integrated within the DevOPs team who will be a part of developing infrastructure software, maintaining it, and scaling it.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREA
● Contribute to design, write and deliver software to improve the reliability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of your services.   
● Solve problems relating to mission critical services and create solutions to prevent problem recurrence; with the goal of automating response to all non-exceptional service conditions.   
● Influence and contribute to new designs, architectures, standards and methods for large-scale distributed systems.   
● Engage in service capacity planning and demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning. 
● Participates in the final roll out of new releases. This includes performance and site acceptance testing that will assure adherence to functional specifications.
● Monitoring high level product problem concerns and seeking commitment from appropriate departments so that necessary actions can be taken
● Serving as an expert in the application of product problem and/or reliability analysis techniques.
● Perform root cause analysis for production issues where the root cause is in infrastructure, environment, configuration, or deployment routines; understand when to escalate to product development teams; remediate root causes and implement preventative actions.
● Participate in after-hours maintenance when necessary, respond to emergencies, participate in customer calls when called upon in support of initiatives and incident response
● Creating complex and/or new reports and metrics
● Participate in 24*7 rotation duties
